name: GPU Benchmark A
description:
GPU Benchmark.

Developer
  • Website: Brad App List
Features
  • Frames Per Second (FPS) counter.
  • Mobile ready map works good on integrated graphics as well as dedicated graphics.
Game Menu Menu
Esc/Ctrl + MToggle FPSCtrl + JPlayEnterPlay ReverseCtrl + EnterPausePStopLResetODirectionBackspace Player Menu Move forward/backward/left (strafe)/right (strafe)W/S/A/D
Turn left/rightMouse Description
  • This is a game designed to use as a GPU Benchmark.
Directions
  • The game starts playing a cinematic while showing FPS. 
  • Use the same Settings when comparing the FPS on different computers.
  • To play the cinematic again press Reset and then Play.
Notes
  • GPUBenchmarkA uses Unreal Engine 4 "Sun Temple". 
  • I might make versions for different runtimes to make testing older computers easier.
  • I might add a 32-bit version if anyone needs it.
  • The map is designed to work on mobile so I could create an Android version in the future.
Example Results

Here are the results I got for my laptop so you can compare with your computer. When I have time I am going to compare these results to my old laptop.

ModelHP 15-dy1091wmCPUIntel Core i3-1004G1GPUIntel UHD GraphicsRAM8 GBResolution1366x768WindowWindowedFullscreenVSyncfalseQualityEpicFPS26 V1.0
  • Known Bug: None.
Technical Runtime Chart

The number after A in the filename shows the runtime required to run the game. For example 19 stands for the 2019 runtime. If you don't have the runtime installed the game will ask if you want to install it.

Microsoft Visual C++ 2019 Runtime4.25 or Later19Microsoft Visual C++ 2017/2019 Runtime4.22 or Later17/19Microsoft Visual C++ 2017 Runtime4.15 or Later17Microsoft Visual C++ 2015 Runtime4.10 to 4.1415Microsoft Visual C++ 2013 Runtime4.2 to 4.913 GPUBenchmarkA19-1.0-windows64.zip
  • Unreal Engine Version 4.26.0
  • Microsoft Visual C++ 2019 Runtime
Design
  • The mobile ready map would allow comparing FPS on Windows and Android.
Feedback

What did you like or dislike? Any feedback is appreciated.

Install Instructions

Download the ZIP file, unzip, and run the EXE file. No install is required.
